DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety effectiveness VYC-12 hyaluronic acid ( HA ) injectable gel fill fine line , measure skin texture improvement , improvement skin quality .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness VYC-12 Hyaluronic Acid Injectable Gel Treatment Superficial Cutaneous Depressions
DOC.criteria: Participants good general health Score 2=Moderate ( coarse uneven visual skin texture ) 3=Severe ( coarse visual skin texture , crosshatch fine line ) cheek use 5Point Allergan Skin Roughness Scale ( ASRS ) . Has undergone tissue augmentation dermal filler include HA , calcium hydroxylapatite , autologous fat , mesotherapy , cosmetic procedure ( eg . facelift , laser , photomodulation , intense pulse light , radiofrequency , dermabrasion , chemical peel , ablative procedure ) face neck within past 12 month Has receive crosslinked HA filler anatomic area within past 12 month Has undergone treatment botulinum toxin face neck within past 6 month Has ever receive semipermanent filler permanent facial implant ( eg . polyLlactic acid , polymethylmethacrylate , silicone , expand polytetrafluoroethylene ) anywhere face neck Has facial hair would interfere visualization face neck Has undergone dental procedure within past 6 week Has tendency develop hypertrophic scarring Has history allergy HA product and/or grampositive bacterial protein HA produce Streptococcustype bacteria Has history anaphylactic shock Has previously diagnose streptococcal disease ( eg . recurrent sore throat , acute rheumatic fever ) Has current cutaneous inflammatory infectious process ( eg . acne , herpes ) , abscess , unhealed wound , cancerous precancerous lesion face neck Is ongoing regimen anticoagulation therapy ( eg . warfarin ) Is ongoing regimen medication ( eg . aspirin , ibuprofen ) substance ( eg , herbal supplement garlic , gingko biloba , ginseng ) know increase coagulation time within 10 day undergo study device injection Has begin use overthecounter prescription , oral topical , antiwrinkle product face neck within past 30 day .
